description: A vulnerability using PendingIntent in Bixby Vision prior to versions 3.7.60.8 in Android S(12), 3.7.50.6 in Andorid R(11) and below allows attackers to execute privileged action by hijacking and modifying the intent.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: - <3.7.60.8 in Android S(12), 3.7.50.6 in Andorid R(11) and below
